get.description: Fetch the latest news articles filtered by specified **categories**.  Available Categories: - Education - Politics - EnergyEnvironment - SmallBusiness - Economy - Dealbook - MediaandAdvertising - Sports - Baseball - Golf - Hockey - Business - Technology - Science - Soccer - Tennis - Climate - Space - Health - Arts - Dance - Movies - Music - Television - Theater

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Available Categories: Education Politics EnergyEnvironment SmallBusiness Economy Dealbook MediaandAdvertising Sports Baseball Golf Hockey Business Technology Science Soccer Tennis Climate Space Health Arts Dance Movies Music Television Theater

get.description: Fetch the latest news articles filtered by specified **regions**.  Available Regions: - World - Europe - Americas - US - Africa - AsiaPacific - MiddleEast

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Available Regions: World Europe Americas US Africa AsiaPacific MiddleEast
